title: Celebrate Presidents’ Day with savings on 20TB of Prism Drive cloud storage, now only $89.97
content:
Macworld

Running out of storage on your iPhone or MacBook? It’s time for a cloud storage upgrade, and the best option is Prism Drive. This Presidents’ Day, you can score lifetime access to Prism Drive’s 20TB of premium cloud storage for only $89.97 (reg. $1494).

With Prism Drive, users can connect unlimited devices to their storage space, ensuring the content from your iOS or Android smartphone, tablet, laptop, and other tech will always be protected in your cloud backup home.

Files in transit and at rest are protected by Prism Drive’s military-grade 256-bit AES and HTTPS encryption. This level of end-to-end protection even extends to sharing files via emails or links, which makes it easy to send media to friends, family, and coworkers.

Prism Drive also offers direct file previews for various formats, including audio, video, text, PDFs, MSO files, and images. That way, users can verify the file is the right one before committing to a full download. And speaking of downloads, Prism Drive boasts support for large files, as well as trash recovery for files deleted within 30 days, and upload progress monitoring.

You have until February 19 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific to snag this Presidents’ Day deal. Grab a lifetime subscription to 20TB of Prism Drive Secure Cloud Storage for just $89.97, the best price price online.
